languages.text: "Я... лишь желаю провести с вами столько времени, сколько нам отведено судьбой. Лишь таким я вижу будущее, что сможет вынести мое сердце".
"I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."
languages.original_text: "Я... лишь желаю провести с вами столько времени, сколько нам отведено судьбой. Лишь таким я вижу будущее, что сможет вынести мое сердце".

traits.locale_text: "I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see it is the only one my heart can bear."
"I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see it is the only one my heart can bear."
"I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."
"I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."
"I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."

languages.text: “我……只希望能与你共度命运赐予我们的时光。在我看到的所有未来中，我的心只能接受这样的结果。”
languages.original_text: "I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."

traits.locale_text: “我……只希望能与你共度命运赐予我们的时光。在我看到的所有未来中，我的心只能接受这样的结果。”

languages.text: «Yo... solo deseo pasar tanto tiempo a su lado como el destino nos permita. De los futuros que veo, ese es el único que puede soportar mi corazón».
languages.original_text: "I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... solo deseo pasar tanto tiempo a su lado como el destino nos permita. De los futuros que veo, ese es el único que puede soportar mi corazón».

languages.text: 「運命が与えてくれた時間の限り、ずっとあなたと一緒にいられればいいのに...私が見る未来図の中で、心から願うのはそれだけですわ」
languages.original_text: "I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."

traits.locale_text: 「運命が与えてくれた時間の限り、ずっとあなたと一緒にいられればいいのに...私が見る未来図の中で、心から願うのはそれだけですわ」

languages.text: "Ich ... möchte nur so viel Zeit mit Euch verbringen, wie das Schicksal uns gegeben hat. Unter all den Zukunften, die ich sehe, ist nur diese eine für mein Herz zu ertragen."
languages.original_text: "I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... möchte nur so viel Zeit mit Euch verbringen, wie das Schicksal uns gegeben hat. Unter all den Zukunften, die ich sehe, ist nur diese eine für mein Herz zu ertragen."

languages.text: « Je... Mon seul désir est de passer autant de temps à vos côtés que le destin me le permettra. De tous les avenirs que j'entrevois, c'est le seul que mon cœur peut supporter. »
languages.original_text: "I... only wish to spend as much time with you as fate has given us. Among the futures I see, it is the only one my heart can bear."

traits.locale_text: « Je... Mon seul désir est de passer autant de temps à vos côtés que le destin me le permettra. De tous les avenirs que j'entrevois, c'est le seul que mon cœur peut supporter. »
